name: Frankenhead: A Love Story
description:
Completed project created to explore game maker studio software.

Small platformer featuring Frank and his love Elizabeth who is kidnapped  by an angry Jack-o-lantern and Frank must save her.

Unzip and run platformer_project_beta_002.exe
